WorkItem.Description:
Behavior of "Restart if the idle state resumes" does not match Windows Task Scheduler. 

The checkbox and text are enabled by default without "Start the task only if the computer is idle for:" being checked. When viewed using Windows Task Scheduler, the checkbox is disabled until "Start the task only if the computer is idle for:" is checked.
WorkItem.Summary: Behavior of "Restart if the idle state resumes" does not match Windows Task Scheduler
